Really nice download--some unobtrusive watermarks throughout, good quality on both audio and visual, definitely worth downloading for the purpose of watching.  Interesting movie as well.  Happier than I expected to be.  Maybe not the copy you keep long-term, but good if you are looking to enjoy the movie right now without being distracted by quality issues.
